      • findValidations

        public static List<Validation> findValidations​(String realm,
                                               Integer pageSize,
                                               Integer pageNumber)
        Fetch Validations from the database using page size and num. If pageSize and pageNumber are both null, all results will be returned at once.
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to find in
        pageSize - the pageSize to fetch
        pageNumber - the pageNumber to fetch
        Returns:
        List

      • countAttributes

        public static Long countAttributes​(String realm)

      • findAttributes

        public static List<Attribute> findAttributes​(String realm,
                                             Integer pageSize,
                                             Integer pageNumber)
        Fetch Attributes from the database using page size and num. If pageSize and pageNumber are both null, all results will be returned at once.
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to find in
        pageSize - the pageSize to fetch (Starting from Page 1)
        pageNumber - the pageNumber to fetch
        Returns:
        List

      • findBaseEntitys

        public static List<BaseEntity> findBaseEntitys​(String realm,
                                               Integer pageSize,
                                               Integer pageNumber)
        Fetch a list of BaseEntity types from the database using a realm. If pageSize and pageNumber are both null, all results will be returned at once.
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to find in
        pageSize - the pageSize to fetch
        pageNumber - the pageNumber to fetch
        Returns:
        List

      • findQuestions

        public static List<Question> findQuestions​(String realm,
                                           Integer pageSize,
                                           Integer pageNumber)
        Fetch a list of Question types from the database using a realm, page size and page number. If pageSize and pageNumber are both null, all results will be returned at once.
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to find in
        pageSize - the pageSize to fetch
        pageNumber - the pageNumber to fetch
        Returns:
        List

      • findQuestionQuestions

        public static List<QuestionQuestion> findQuestionQuestions​(String realm,
                                                           Integer pageSize,
                                                           Integer pageNumber)
        Fetch a list of QuestionQuestion types from the database using a realm, page size and page number. If pageSize and pageNumber are both null, all results will be returned at once.
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to find in
        pageSize - the pageSize to fetch
        pageNumber - the pageNumber to fetch
        Returns:
        List

      • findBaseEntityByCode

        public static BaseEntity findBaseEntityByCode​(String realm,
                                              String code)
        Fetch A BaseEntity from the database using the entity code.
        Parameters:
        realm - The realm that the BaseEntity is saved under
        code - The code of the BaseEntity to fetch
        Returns:
        The corresponding BaseEntity, or null if not found.
